text: Man on the Run is a 2023 documentary movie directed by Cassius Michael Kim. The movie is about the 1Malaysia Development Berhad scandal, involving former Prime Minister Najib Razak and fugitive businessman Jho Low. It was released on 19 October 2023 in Malaysia. In November 2023, Netflix acquired worldwide distribution rights to the documentary. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2023 movies Category:2020s documentary movies Category:American documentary movies Category:Malaysian movies Category:Movies about corruption Category:Movies set in Malaysia
title: Man on the Run (2023 movie)
